Introduction

SVT HIPHOP Team (Korean: SVT 힙합팀; Japanese: SVTヒップホップチーム) is a sub-unit of the boy group SEVENTEEN. The Members consist of S.Coups, Wonwoo, Mingyu, And Vernon.

active
